```{r}

library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

# Sample dataset
data <- data.frame(
  team = c("Team A", "Team A", "Team B", "Team B", "Team C", "Team C"),
  x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6),
  y = c(5, 4, 9, 6, 8, 7)
)

fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Reactive Table and Dynamic ggplot Example"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      selectInput("team", "Select Team:", choices = unique(data$team))
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("plot"),
      tableOutput("table")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    selected_team <- input$team
    filtered_data <- data[data$team == selected_team, ]
    
    ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
      geom_point() +
      labs(title = paste("Scatter Plot for", selected_team))
  })
  
  output$table <- renderTable({
    selected_team <- input$team
    filtered_data <- data[data$team == selected_team, ]
    filtered_data
  })
}






```
